 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָנַק‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==indulge, pamper== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el; compare [[Eccl.14.16|Eccl 14:16]] Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> II.; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פנק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Pa\`el); — Participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְפַנֵּק‎</span> [[Prov.29.21|Prov 29:21]] ***one pampering*** a servant. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּס‎</span>] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פסס‎</span>. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּס דַּמִּים‎</span> see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶפֶס ד‎</span>.
